meanings.definition: A person or group that monopolizes something.
meanings.sent1: The monopolizers controlled all the resources in the town.
meanings.sent2: The monopolizers in the industry set high prices for their products.
meanings.sent3: The monopolizers at the party only wanted to play one game all night.
meanings.sent4: The monopolizers of knowledge hoarded all the information for themselves.
meanings.sent5: The monopolizers of the market made it impossible for new businesses to thrive.

meanings.sent1: The monopolizers of the market were investigated for unfair practices.
meanings.sent2: Monopolizers can stifle competition and innovation in an industry.
meanings.sent3: The monopolizers of the snacks at the picnic were caught red-handed.
meanings.sent4: The monopolizers of the conversation dominated every topic with their opinions.
meanings.sent5: The monopolizers of time made it difficult for others to have a chance to speak.
